channel.title: Professional Development on Patrick Gatewood's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Professional Development on Patrick Gatewood's Blog

item.title: How to Have a Successful Internship
item.description: Whether you’ve just landed an exciting internship for next year or you’re right in the middle of an internship at your dream agency, it’s up to you to get the most out of your experience. You decide what you take away from it, so check out these guidelines on how to design your internship to help you grow as an individual, your way. Full article: https://willowtreeapps.com/ideas/how-to-have-a-successful-internship
